sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9feff0b34f31820023bf3879b110c77a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PopUp_User_details</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>PopUp_User_details</name><script><![CDATA[var PopUp_User_details = Class.create();
PopUp_User_details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	GetDetails : function(){
		var UserId = this.getParameter('sysparm_UserId');
		var values = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_test');
		gr.addQuery('sys_created_by',gs.getUserName());
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
			values.push(gr.u_name);
			values.push(gr.u_address);
		}
		return values.toString();
	}
	
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-17 13:44:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9feff0b34f31820023bf3879b110c77a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PopUp_User_details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9feff0b34f31820023bf3879b110c77a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-08-17 18:07:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="User records">52970c3f4ffd420023bf3879b110c7b2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Pop up message entered previously</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var ga = new GlideAjax('PopUp_User_details');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'GetDetails');
	//ga.addParam('sysparm_UserId', g_user.UserID);
	ga.getXML(getResponse);
	
	function getResponse(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer").split(',');
		g_form.setValue('name', answer[0]);
		g_form.setValue('address', answer[1]);
		
		
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-17 14:05:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>912d34b34f31820023bf3879b110c73d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pop up message entered previously</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_912d34b34f31820023bf3879b110c73d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-08-17 18:08:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Records">5fe78c3f4ffd420023bf3879b110c78e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2087da974f95820023bf3879b110c739
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AssignmentGroup_PopUp_CI</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>To pop up assignment group based on CI selected </description><name>AssignmentGroup_PopUp_CI</name><script><![CDATA[var AssignmentGroup_PopUp_CI = Class.create();
AssignmentGroup_PopUp_CI.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
	popup: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
		gr.addQuery('sys_id',this.getParameter('sysparm_ci'));
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next())
			{
			return gr.support_group;
		}
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-07-22 10:30:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2087da974f95820023bf3879b110c739</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AssignmentGroup_PopUp_CI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2087da974f95820023bf3879b110c739</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-07-22 10:30:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for short_description in change_request, if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>change_request.short_description</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[if(gs.getUser().isMemberOf(current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue().toString()))

}
else

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-07 13:42:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>59b169684f7d020023bf3879b110c704</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>change_request.short_description</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_59b169684f7d020023bf3879b110c704</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-08-25 07:39:31</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
   var gr = new GlideRecord('u_test');
	var user = gs.getUserName();
	gr.addQuery('sys_created_by',user);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next())
		{
		gr.deleteRecord();
	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d87210bf4ffd420023bf3879b110c73f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.user_record</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>user_record</name><script><![CDATA[var user_record = Class.create();
user_record.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	popUp : function(){
		var userName = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_name');
		var address = this.getParameter('sysparm_address');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_test');
		gr.addQuery('sys_created_by',gs.getUserName());
		gr.query();
		if(!gr.next()) {
			gr.initialize();
			gr.setValue('u_name', userName);
			gr.setValue('u_address', address);
			gr.insert();
		}
		else {
			gr.setValue('u_name', userName);
			gr.setValue('u_address', address);
			gr.update();
		}
	},
	type: 'user_record'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-17 10:47:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d87210bf4ffd420023bf3879b110c73f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>user_record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d87210bf4ffd420023bf3879b110c73f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-08-18 14:24:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global                          " table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_test</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Delete record after saved to user table</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_test');
	var user = gs.getUserName();
	gr.addQuery('sys_created_by',user);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next())
		{
		gr.deleteRecord();
	}
}
//while(gr.next())

// var gR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
// gR.addQuery('first_name', gr.u_name);

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-09-03 09:03:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global                          </sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3c8f1f414f96420023bf3879b110c7d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete record after saved to user table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3c8f1f414f96420023bf3879b110c7d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-09-03 10:08:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3c8f1f414f96420023bf3879b110c7d8"/></record_update>
